block.p: BORDERS GROUP, Ann Arbor, Mich., named Edward Wilhelm, vice president for finance at Borders Inc., to the post of senior vice president and chief financial officer. He succeeds Kenneth Scheve, who is retiring.

BORDERS GROUP, Ann Arbor, Mich., named Edward Wilhelm, vice president for finance at Borders Inc., to the post of senior vice president and chief financial officer. He succeeds Kenneth Scheve, who is retiring.

CONVERGENCE COMMUNICATIONS, Salt Lake City, named Douglas K. Jacobs chief executive, succeeding Lance D'Ambrosio, who remains chairman. Mr. Jacobs had been senior vice president and a regional president at Alcatel USA.

PRINCETON ECOM, Princeton, N.J., named Curtis R. Welling chief executive, succeeding Donald C. Licciardello, who remains chairman. Mr. Welling had been executive vice president at SG Americas as well as president and chief executive at SG Cowen Securities Corp.
